metadata.creator: Sunspire Studios
metadata.description:
The full Soundtrack of the open-source version of Tux Racer.

Title: Tux Racer
Platform: PC
Released: 2000
Published by: Sunspire Studios
Developed by: Jasmin Patry, Sunspire Studios
Composed by: Joseph Toscano

Audio Tracks were extracted from the game's files and converted from .it to .mp3.
